root.name: Turok 2
root.description: Very little is known about the proposed sequel, other than a few facts.Joseph Turok would once again have been the main character.Combat would have included the knife and the bow, as before.True to the series' roots, the gameplay would principally have consisted of battling dinosaurs in a jungle setting, though it is unclear whether it took place on the same planet as Turok.At least early in its production, the title was simply "Turok 2".
